entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Stewart
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stewart Airport 11:51 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Local drifting snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
